mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (TP_BOARDID, WRITER, TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_REGDATE, HIT, B_UPDOWN, TP_ID, F_ID, F_NAME, F_PATH) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{b_content}, SYSDATE, 0, 0, 2, FILE_SEQ.nextval, #{f_name}, #{f_path})
mapper.select:
SELECT B.*, T.TP_NAME FROM BOARD B, TVPROGRAM T WHERE 1 = 1
AND B.TP_ID = T.TP_ID ORDER BY TP_BOARDID
AND B.TP_ID = T.TP_ID ORDER BY HIT DESC
AND B.TP_ID = T.TP_ID ORDER BY B_UPDOWN DESC
AND B.TP_ID = T.TP_ID ORDER BY B_REGDATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, B_CONTENT = #{b_content}, UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE, TP_ID = 1, F_NAME = #{f_name}, F_PATH = #{f_path} WHERE TP_BOARDID = #{tp_boardid}
UPDATE BOARD SET HIT = HIT + 1 WHERE TP_BOARDID = #{tp_boardid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY (TP_REPLYID, TP_BOARDID, R_WRITER, R_CONTENT, R_REGDATE, R_UPDOWN) VALUES (REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{tp_boardid}, #{r_writer}, #{r_content}, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT TP_NAME, TP_MEMBER, TP_RATION, TP_GENRE, TP_BRDCS, TP_COUNTRY, TP_CONTENT FROM TVPROGRAM
